EventAnalyser Class Reference

The Leica Scanstation C5 SDK throws events containing information about the current process.
For example, an event indicating DONE when connection between Leica and PC is required.
To be able to handle this events, the programmer should create an Event Handler and combine it with this class to understand the information received. More...

Detailed Description

The Leica Scanstation C5 SDK throws events containing information about the current process.
For example, an event indicating DONE when connection between Leica and PC is required.
To be able to handle this events, the programmer should create an Event Handler and combine it with this class to understand the information received.
